text: An Ohio lawmaker has been fired from his job as an emergency room doctor after sparking a backlash by asking whether the "colored population" is more susceptible to the coronavirus because they "do not wash their hands as well as other groups." https://t.co/ayvFvnqoW4

BREAKING: RNC picks Jacksonville, Florida, as site for President Trump to accept the Republican presidential nomination.

name: NBCNews
text: U.S. Customs and Border Protection spent portions of a $112M emergency fund meant to buy food, medicine, and other items for migrants on ATVS, dirt bikes, and boats, according to a Government Accountability Office report. https://t.co/dCJby2gF9w
